name: Cursed Treasure (Phoenix Games)
description:
My Entry for the GameDev.tv GameJam as a single GameDev:

"All that glistens is not gold."

This quote from Shakespeare inspired my playercharacter... well... it's Shakespeare. You jump around in this platformer, shooting the famous skull around and try to collect as many goldcoins as you can... but they are cursed and the more you ransack, the slower you get... it is a curse after all!

And that's not enough, deep in the dungeon lies the incredible gem... but what happens after you collect it?

Fight against your greed... don't collect all the coins, as you might die, doing so.  Still... every coin is worth a point.

How high is your highscore?

Music and part of the SFX  by: Soundimage.org, Eric Matyas. Some other SFX: Found on freesound.org

Everything else by me. I hope you have fun with my game and please leave me a feedback.

Thanks a lot

Dominik / Phoenix Games
